author: Reuters Editorial
title: Gb, Pil trim4 rivisto al ribasso a +0,4% su trim, +1,4% su anno Macroeconomia
text: LONDON, Feb 22 (Reuters) - The Office for National Statistics issued the following seasonally adjusted gross domestic product (GDP) data on Thursday. (Constant prices, previous estimates in brackets): Q4 2017 Q3 2017 F'CAST GDP AT MARKET PRICES (constant prices) pct change q/q 0.4 (0.5) 0.5 (0.4) 0.5 pct change y/y 1.4 (1.5) 1.8 (1.7) 1.5 IMPLIED GDP DEFLATOR AT MARKET PRICES Pct change q/q 0.3 0.3 (0.3) Pct change y/y 1.7 2.0 (1.7) OUTPUT DATA Q/Q Y/Y Agriculture etc -0.9 (-0.4) -1.1 (-0.6) Mining/quarrying inc oil -4.7 (-3.9) 1.4 (2.9) Manufacturing sector 1.3 (1.3) 3.4 (3.1) Electricity, gas, air -0.5 (0.4) -2.1 (-2.0) Water supply, sewage 0.0 (0.3) 0.6 (1.1) Total production 0.5 (0.6) 2.3 (2.3) Construction -0.7 (-1.0) 0.9 (0.6) Distribution,hotels,catering -0.2 (0.1) -0.1 (0.5) Transport and communication 1.1 (0.8) 2.3 (1.1) Business, services & finance 0.9 (0.8) 2.2 (2.1) Government and other services 0.2 (0.4) 0.7 (1.1) Total service industries 0.6 (0.6) 1.4 (1.4) EXPENDITURE DATA (constant prices) Q/Q Y/Y Households 0.3 1.4 Non-profit institutions -0.1 0.1 General government 0.6 0.9 Gross fixed capital formation 1.1 3.8 of which business investment 0.0 2.1 Total domestic 0.9 2.3 Total exports -0.2 1.7 Total final expenditure 0.6 2.2 less total imports 1.5 4.2 GDP at market prices 0.4 1.4 INCOME DATA Q/Q Y/Y Compensation of employees 0.5 3.3 Gross operating surplus 1.3 2.7 of corporations
